outputs.output_descr:
Support to Mitigate Human-Wildlife Conflict Issues in Bhutan through
Improvement of rural livelihood through Sustainable utilization of Natural Resources
Conservation of  endagered species
Combat rural crop damage by wild life to alleviate rural poverty
Crop damge reduced through use of innovative technologies
Map hotspot areas for better prediction of conflicts to relate Human wildlife conflict and poverty nexus
Introduction of Livestock and crop insutance schemes

Support to Mitigate Human-Wildlife Conflict Issues in Bhutan through

project_descr: Support implementation of the strategy through multi-pronged interventions including electric fencing; promotion of alternative livelihoods to offset losses; establishing community based compensation schemes; and the establishment of endowment fund.
